item.title: Bradenton man charged in deadly stabbing had prior arrest for similar incident
item.description: Officials say despite life-saving efforts, the 40-year-old stabbing victim was pronounced dead around 7:15 a.m. at Blake Hospital.

Sewer line collapse at 4th Ave W. and 10th St. W. in Bradenton
item.description: There is currently no estimated time for when repairs will be completed.

item.title: Office manager sentenced to 15 years for defrauding dental practices
item.description: Prosecutors said she defrauded the local practices out of tens of thousands of dollars

item.title: Pres. Trump addresses religious freedom
item.description: Alleging that public school students are “indoctrinated with antireligious propaganda”, President Trump on Monday announced new federal guidance regarding school prayer.

item.title: Construction equipment theft ring smashed, Charlotte sheriff says
item.description: Six men have been arrested and the sheriff’s office says up to 12 more arrests could be made soon.

item.title: Sarasota County holds ribbon-cutting for new pickleball courts at Ronald Foxworthy Campus
item.description: The renovations are part of the county’s pickleball master plan, which began in 2017.

item.title: Local boat operator in court for April Clearwater Ferry crash charges
item.description: Investigators say the boat slammed into a ferry carrying 45 passengers.

item.title: Jurisdiction dispute delays Sarasota case of couple accused of in-flight sex acts
item.description: Prosecutors say a jurisdictional question is slowing the case.

item.title: Showers and thunderstorms in the forecast
item.description: An area of low pressure will keep the clouds and a chance for rain going through Wednesday.

item.title: ‘Stop the violence’: Neighbors react to deadly Bradenton stabbing
item.description: This stabbing incident is the second in a week that Addition was allegedly a part of.
